headline: University guide 2018: Bath Spa University
text: interactive      Studio space at Sion Hill campus. Photograph: Andrew Southall    Fees 9,250 per year for home and EU undergraduates in 2017-18. Prices range from 12,500-13,500 for international students studying full-time degree courses. Bursaries Bath Spa University provides 350 awards worth 3,500 each, split over three years, to eligible first year students new to higher education in 2017-18. More information can be found at bathspa.ac.uk/bath-spa-university-bursaries A full list of scholarships is available here bathspa.ac.uk/scholarships-and-funding. Accommodation Prices will start from 79 per week for a shared twin room, to 242 per week for a premium studio.  ContactTel: 01225 875875Email: enquiries@bathspa.ac.ukWeb: bathspa.ac.ukAccommodation: accommodation@bathspa.ac.uk
